title: Charades Women's Deluxe Beer Garden Girl Costume Dress with Petticoat
features: Velvet Dress, Peticoat and Choker. Bustier is attached. (Stockings and boots not included)
Hand Wash, Line Dry. 100% Polyester, 100% Cotton

Womens X-Small 3-5 (Great for Teens), Small 5-7, Medium 8-10, Large 11-13 and X-Large 14-16 - Some customer have told us this runs just a bit short - may wish to purchase UP ONE SIZE if you are at high end of range.
description: Looking for something wear when serving bratwurst, schnitzel, frosty mugs of german lager, or just want that bavarian girl dirndl look this is the costume for you! important: costumes are sized differently than apparel, use the Charades adult female size Chart, do not choose based on clothing size. From inspiration, through design and construction, Charades takes pride in quality materials and excellent finished products.
